00033 class SummaryInfo {
00034  public:
00035    SummaryInfo(sampleCount samples);
00036 
00037    int            fields; /* Usually 3 for Min, Max, RMS */
00038    sampleFormat   format;
00039    int            bytesPerFrame;
00040    sampleCount    frames64K;
00041    int            offset64K;
00042    sampleCount    frames256;
00043    int            offset256;
00044    int            totalSummaryBytes;
00045 };

00049 class BlockFile {
00050  public:
00051 
00052    // Constructor / Destructor
00053 
00055    BlockFile(wxFileName fileName, sampleCount samples);
00056    virtual ~BlockFile();
00057 
00058    static void Deinit();
00059 
00060    // Reading
00061 
00063    virtual int ReadData(samplePtr data, sampleFormat format,
00064                         sampleCount start, sampleCount len) = 0;
00065 
00066    // Other Properties
00067    
00068    // Write cache to disk, if it has any
00069    virtual bool GetNeedWriteCacheToDisk() { return false; }
00070    virtual void WriteCacheToDisk() { /* no cache by default */ }
00071 
00072    // Fill read cache of block file, if it has any
00073    virtual bool GetNeedFillCache() { return false; }
00074    virtual void FillCache() { /* no cache by default */ }
00075 
00077    virtual void SaveXML(XMLWriter &xmlFile) = 0;
00078 
00080    virtual wxFileName GetFileName();
00081    virtual void SetFileName(wxFileName &name);
00082 
00083    virtual sampleCount GetLength() { return mLen; }
00084 
00086    virtual void Lock();
00088    virtual void Unlock();
00090    virtual bool IsLocked();
00091 
00093    virtual void GetMinMax(sampleCount start, sampleCount len,
00094                           float *outMin, float *outMax, float *outRMS);
00096    virtual void GetMinMax(float *outMin, float *outMax, float *outRMS);
00098    virtual bool Read256(float *buffer, sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00100    virtual bool Read64K(float *buffer, sampleCount start, sampleCount len);
00101 
00103    virtual bool IsAlias() { return false; }
00104    
00106    virtual bool IsSummaryAvailable(){return true;}
00107 
00109    virtual bool IsDataAvailable(){return true;}
00110    
00112    virtual bool IsSummaryBeingComputed(){return false;}
00113    
00115    virtual BlockFile *Copy(wxFileName newFileName) = 0;
00116 
00117    virtual wxLongLong GetSpaceUsage() = 0;
00118 
00120    //summary only), write out a placeholder of silence data (missing
00121    //.au) or mark the blockfile to deal some other way without spewing
00122    //errors.
00123    virtual void Recover() = 0;
00125    //continue and the error persists, don't keep reporting it.  The
00126    //Object implements this functionality internally, but we want to
00127    //be able to tell the logging to shut up from outside too.
00128    void SilenceLog() { mSilentLog = TRUE; }
00129 
00132    virtual void CloseLock(){Lock();}
00133    
00135    virtual void LockRead(){}
00137    virtual void UnlockRead(){}
00138 
00139  private:
00140 
00141    friend class DirManager;
00142    //needed for Ref/Deref access.
00143    friend class ODComputeSummaryTask;
00144    friend class ODDecodeTask;
00145    friend class ODPCMAliasBlockFile;
00146 
00147    virtual void Ref();
00148    virtual bool Deref();
00149    virtual int RefCount(){return mRefCount;}
00150 
00151  protected:
00153    virtual void *CalcSummary(samplePtr buffer, sampleCount len,
00154                              sampleFormat format);
00156    virtual bool ReadSummary(void *data) = 0;
00157 
00160    virtual void FixSummary(void *data);
00161 
00162  private:
00163    int mLockCount;
00164    int mRefCount;
00165 
00166    static char *fullSummary;
00167 
00168  protected:
00169    wxFileName mFileName;
00170    sampleCount mLen;
00171    SummaryInfo mSummaryInfo;
00172    float mMin, mMax, mRMS;
00173    bool mSilentLog;
00174 };

00202

00205                         sampleCount start, sampleCount len) = 0;
00206

00208 
00210    // applying to Alias file access
00211    void SilenceAliasLog() { mSilentAliasLog = TRUE; }
00212 
00213

00215    // These methods are for advanced use only!

00221    void ChangeAliasedFile(wxFileName newAliasedFile);

00224
